compgc01

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • compgc01.Encryption

  • public class Encryption
extends Object
    A class that encrypts selected resources of our cinema booking management application, such as usernames and passwords. Adapted from Johaness Brodwall's example in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1132567/encrypt-password-in-configuration-files.
    Since:
    12.12.2017
    Author:
    Team 3: Filippos Zofakis and Lucio D'Alessandro
